title: SQL Injection Shopping Portal
description: Exploit an SQL injection vulnerability to access the admin panel of a shopping portal.
hints: Try to manipulate the SQL query with special characters.
Look for ways to bypass the login check without a valid password.
Consider how SQL injection can be used to change the logic of the query.
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of SQL injection
Learn how to exploit authentication vulnerabilities
Gain hands-on experience with web application security testing
